user.title: Connect to iSolarCloud
user.description: Enter your iSolarCloud API credentials. You can find them here: [iSolarCloud]({url})

data_description.app_id: App ID from iSolarCloud Developer Platform. To find this, go to your application and look for 'id' within the URL like so: {app_id_url}.

auth.title: Authorize App
auth.description:
Please visit the URL below to authorize the application:

{auth_url}

**Instructions:**
1. Visit the link above and log in.
2. You will be redirected (page may show an error).
3. Copy the **code** parameter from the URL address bar.
4. Paste it below.

error.invalid_auth_url: Could not find 'applicationId' in the provided URL.
